No. 420 evin arez san â‚¹16, DEPARTMENT BULSAR NOTARY DANGS KHANDUBHA & AFFIDAVIT DISTRICTS STATEO OF GILLARA I Chho tubmai Gopalji Desai, aged about 82 years, Occupation Retired, residing at Avdhut Society, Tithal Road, Valsad, Taluka and District Vaisad, Gujarat Stata, India C hereby solomnly affirm and declare on oath'as under: Mr Mohanlal Dayalji Dosai who is at present residing at Shraddha Appartment, Tithal Road, Valsad, was born in the year 1912, at Katargam, District Surat, Gujarat State. I know Shri Mohanlal since his childhood as ha is my distant relative. Therefore, I know the above facts certainly. This affidavit is made in order to obtain Viza for visiting U.S.A. for Mr .Mohanlal Dayalji Dasai. The above stated facts are true.
